alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Kanawha; Putnam; Roane (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 14 at 8:21AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...Gusty showers will impact portions of northern Kanawha, central Putnam, Roane and southeastern Jackson Counties through 900 AM EDT... At 820 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of gusty showers extending from near Ripley to near Hurricane. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Charleston, Nitro, Ripley, Spencer, Winfield, Jefferson, South Charleston, St. Albans, Dunbar, Hurricane, Sissonville, Chesapeake, Eleanor, Marmet, Belle, Clendenin, Poca, Pinch, Institute and Tornado. This includes the following highways... Interstate 79 between mile markers 1 and 25. Interstate 77 in West Virginia between mile markers 96 and 137. Interstate 64 in West Virginia between mile markers 35 and 57. West Virginia Turnpike between mile markers 89 and 95. Route 119 between mile markers 73 and 80. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
